CONFIRM_ITEM_CONDITION: I confirm that the item is in good used condition.
FAQ_HEADING_1: How is the purchase price calculated?
FAQ_DESCRIPTION_1: The price you receive for your sale is calculated based on the new price. You receive 35% of the new price + shipping costs.
FAQ_HEADING_2: How do I receive money for the items I sell?
FAQ_DESCRIPTION_2: 10 days after the sale and if there are no complaints from customers, the money will automatically be credited to your specified bank account.
FAQ_DESCRIPTION_3: The seller is responsible for shipping. The customer's address and the optimal shipping method of Swiss Post will be displayed in the sales confirmation email.
FAQ_DESCRIPTION_4: Once you have offered an item for sale on the marketplace, we will offer this offer on various marketplaces to find a seller. As soon as the item has been sold, you will receive a notification by email.
NAME: Name
SEARCH_TITLE: Easily sell books and get money
SERVICE_DESCRIPTION_1: Search for your item and let them show the price!
SERVICE_DESCRIPTION_2: You will receive an email after your item has been sold
SERVICE_DESCRIPTION_3: You ship items to the buyer and receive payment
